title: Troubleshoot Folder Names with Spaces or Special Characters Halt Model Builds
introduction: When a space character appears the file path, the SimulinkÂ® Real-Timeâ¢ model build reports an error: When a special character, such as an open parenthesis character "(", appears in the file path, the model build reports an error:

chunks.heading: What This Issue Means
chunks.content: For the Simulink Real-Time model build â¦ message or for the Error(s) encountered while building â¦ message, message indicates that a space character or special character appears in the file path. The QNXÂ® NeutrinoÂ® toolchain for the code generation target is not compatible with file paths that contain spaces or special characters, the model build halts and does not output a real-time application.

chunks.heading: Try This Workaround
chunks.content: Try these workaround options to resolve the model build errors.

chunks.heading: Create a Build Folder
chunks.content: Create a folder name that does not have spaces or special characters in it. Build your model in that folder.

chunks.heading: Map the Build Folder
chunks.content: Map the folder name or path that has spaces or special characters in it to a folder name or path without spaces or special characters. Build your model in the mapped folder.
